channel.title: Meta Learning on Oleg Baydakov
channel.description: Recent content in Meta Learning on Oleg Baydakov

item.title: Understanding objective functions in neural networks
Deconstructing Deep Meta Learning
item.description: This article explores in more detail the idea of Meta Learning that was previously introduced in a post “The Meta Model and Meta Meta Model of Deep Learning”. In this post, I explore “Learning to Learn” as a Meta Learning approach. We have to be very careful to distinguish between Learning to Learn and Hyper Parameter Optimization (HPO). HPO and more generally searching for architectures differs from “learning to learn” in that that HPO explores the space of architectures while meta-learning explores the space of learning algorithms.
